items.sentence: Tom left the fridge door open, so I closed it.
Do you think people drink more in a recession?
I hope you're not keeping any secrets from me.
I don't eat meat, shellfish, poultry or gravy.
I think that cultural exchanges are important.
I think you'll really enjoy reading this book.
I have a good-paying job with excellent hours.
You may stay in Australia as long as you like.
You left the TV on when you left this morning.
I can't just leave my family behind like that.
Tom doesn't care how crazy people think he is.
Do you think that I don't know what I'm doing?
Are you sure that that's the best thing to do?
Do you think that you're the only one in pain?
Are you sure that you want to keep doing this?
Somebody told me that Tom now lives in Boston.
My job is to make sure that everybody is safe.
I think that I've figured out how to fix this.
Didn't I tell you that I had it under control?
I think that what you just told me isn't true.
